task_description:
# Add Micro-interactions to Components

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-92](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-92/add-micro-interactions-to-components)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Hover states, loading, feedback animations

patterns.styled_components: Components use Emotion's styled API from @emotion/styled
patterns.material_ui_integration: Material UI components styled via sx prop and theme overrides
patterns.accessibility: Global prefers-reduced-motion support already in theme.ts lines 79-84
patterns.loading_pattern: Button uses CircularProgress, DataTable uses Skeleton for loading states

existing_implementations.description: Animations already exist for buttons, cards, and table rows. Need to extend to other components and add advanced feedback animations.
